title: Why i can't login to my PBE account
body:
I can't login to my account pls 
help me *CRY*

replies.body: Mmmhm, I wasn't able to locate a PBE account tied to the one you're posting from.  If you have a PBE tied to another, you can use the [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to retrieve it.  Good luck!
